name: Renewals of existing policies
text:
[§431:21-108]  Renewals of existing policies.  Member insurers shall renew policies in existence on June 18, 1991, on property situated in the area designated by the commissioner under section 431:21-107.  A member insurer may choose not to renew such a policy if the insured property does not meet the member insurer's underwriting criteria. [L 1991, c 284, pt of §2]
 
Revision Note
 
  "June 18, 1991" substituted for "the effective date of this article".
